document_data.name: Basil
document_data.mainbody: '''Basil of Lyndusfarne''' was an unusual [[verbeeg]] in the service of the Kingdom of [[Hartsvale]] in the 1370s [[DR]]. He was a [[runecaster]], a rarity among his people.
document_data.Description: Basil was more than eight feet tall, with gangly arms, stooped shoulders, and thick bowed legs. He had a large belly. His eyebrows and scrawny beard were coarse and gray.
document_data.History: Basil met and befriended [[Tavis Burdun]], just moments before the princess [[Brianna Burdun|Brianna]] was kidnapped. He and the orphan [[Avner]] accompanied Tavis in the rescue mission. In time, he became a good friend of both Tavis and Brianna. Unfortunately during the final battle against the [[Twilight Spirit]], Basil's body was permanently deformed.
